title: Turkey Red Ty Cobb for sale
author: drumback

posts.post_title: Turkey Red Ty Cobb for sale
posts.post_content:
T3 Cobb for sale, very good eye appeal, graded PSA authentic, I believe due to tape removal on back.  Can't find any other signs of alteration to account for the "authentic" grade.

$2250 delivered and insured.  Scans available.
